item.title: The Learning Pipeline - How to Keep Learning
item.description: I was able to participate on Proofpoint’s Summer Intern panel discussion today and wanted to share my answer to one of the questions: how do you keep learning. When this question came up, I had the luxury of listening to a few of the other panelists before responding with my own answer which consisted of the following four steps. 1. Reading Online Community Discussions to Survey Information At the broadest level, I like to stay abreast of new technologies and events by following topics of discussion.
